subject: Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky squad left with perhaps a half-dozen players weighing their N.B.A. draft prospects, but its departure did not completely strip the final of high-caliber recruits.
